CodeIssue.Title: Class Contains Inner Class
CodeIssue.Description: When translated into bytecode, any inner classes are rebuilt within the JVM as external classes within the same package. As a result, any class in the package can access these inner classes. The enclosing class's private fields become protected fields, accessible by the now external 'inner class'.
